products.name: Ceramic Bug Cube
products.description: A unique square-shaped ceramic piece, artfully designed in sleek black. This bug-inspired sculpture adds a touch of whimsical elegance to any space.

products.name: Ebon Cream Wall Art
products.description: A striking piece of wall art featuring a harmonious blend of black and cream colors. This handcrafted artwork is perfect for adding a modern yet rustic charm to your decor.

products.name: Keepsake Box
products.description: This exquisite box is crafted from delicately stitched bamboo canes. Perfect for storing your treasured items, it brings a touch of nature's beauty into your home.

products.name: Bamboo Cake Tray
products.description: A beautifully handcrafted tray made from bamboo canes, ideal for serving cakes and pastries. Its rustic elegance makes it a perfect centerpiece for your gatherings.

products.name: Artisan Carry Box
products.description: A handmade carrier box that combines functionality with aesthetic appeal. Its sturdy construction and natural finish make it ideal for transporting goods with style.

products.name: Feather Charm Stick
products.description: An enchanting ornament stick adorned with delicate feathers. This handcrafted piece adds a bohemian flair to any setting, perfect for enhancing your decorative arrangements.
